name: Satin Regent Co-ord
description: Made from luxurious satin cotton, this deep green co-ord set blends subtle sheen with a structured fit, exuding quiet confidence.
longDescription: Made from luxurious satin cotton, this deep green co-ord set blends subtle sheen with a structured fit, exuding quiet confidence. The rich jewel tone and smooth finish bring a vintage aristocratic air, perfect for those who appreciate timeless style over fleeting trends. Designed for comfort without sacrificing elegance, it's a statement in understated luxury.

name: Shamray Estate Co-ord
description: Crafted from premium Indian Shamray, this beige co-ord set channels effortless sophistication with a relaxed yet refined silhouette.
longDescription: Crafted from premium Indian Shamray, this beige co-ord set channels effortless sophistication with a relaxed yet refined silhouette. Its lightweight weave drapes elegantly, making it perfect for warm days when style still matters. The understated hue and sharp tailoring give off an old-money charm that never tries too hard – it simply speaks for itself.

name: The Heritage Rebel
description: SOCH - The First Hood. A symbol of rebellion wrapped in comfort.
longDescription: Our first-ever hoodie blends Mughal-inspired detailing with modern streetwear flair. Crafted from heavyweight cotton fleece, it features a structured silhouette, deep-set details, and the rebellious spirit that defines SOCH.

name: Afsanay
description: Afsanay collection weaves stories through fabric, combining traditional storytelling elements with modern fashion design.
longDescription: The Afsanay collection draws inspiration from the rich storytelling traditions of Pakistan, translating these narratives into beautiful, wearable art. These pieces feature unique patterns, traditional motifs, and contemporary cuts that make every garment a conversation starter.
fabric: Premium cotton with traditional block prints

name: Raah-e-Manzil
description: Raah-e-Manzil represents the journey towards excellence in fashion, combining the best of traditional techniques with innovative design approaches.
longDescription: This collection embodies the journey of Pakistani fashion evolution, showcasing how traditional techniques can be elevated through modern design thinking. Raah-e-Manzil pieces feature innovative fabric combinations, contemporary cuts, and traditional craftsmanship that results in truly unique garments.
fabric: Premium cotton and silk blend with traditional embroidery

name: Éclat Royale - Impression of Creed Aventus
description: Éclat Royale – The Essence of Power & Prestige. Step into a world of sophistication with Éclat Royale, a masterful impression of the legendary Creed Aventus.
longDescription: Crafted for those who desire the commanding presence of the original without the extravagant price tag, Éclat Royale delivers luxury within reach. With its bold, fruity opening of pineapple, blackcurrant, and bergamot, it immediately captures attention. The heart reveals a refined blend of jasmine and patchouli, balanced with a whisper of dry birch, while the base settles into rich notes of oakmoss, ambergris, and vanilla – a scent profile that speaks of power, elegance, and timeless appeal.
features: Luxury for less – enjoy the iconic Aventus-inspired scent at a fraction of the cost
Premium longevity & projection – designed to linger and turn heads
Versatile elegance – perfect for both day and night wear
Bold, fruity opening with pineapple, blackcurrant, and bergamot
Refined heart with jasmine, patchouli, and birch
Rich base with oakmoss, ambergris, and vanilla

name: Roselina - Impression of Delina
description: Roselina captures the essence of feminine elegance with its sophisticated blend of floral and fruity notes.
longDescription: A perfect impression of the iconic Delina fragrance, offering luxury and sophistication at an accessible price point. Experience the perfect balance of fresh florals and warm undertones that create an unforgettable impression. Roselina is designed for the modern woman who appreciates both luxury and value, delivering the same sophisticated scent profile as the original Delina without the premium price tag.
features: Perfect for day and evening wear
